meanings.definition: characteristic of or resembling a prep school or its students
meanings.sent1: The preppiest students always wore collared shirts and khaki pants.
meanings.sent2: She had the preppiest outfit at the party, complete with a pearl necklace.
meanings.sent3: Even the dog looked preppiest in the tiny sweater and bowtie.
meanings.sent4: The garden party was the preppiest event of the year, with everyone in pastel colors.
meanings.sent5: The preppiest house on the block had a perfectly manicured lawn and white picket fence.

meanings.definition: having the style or qualities associated with prep school students
meanings.sent1: His preppiest haircut was a neatly combed side part.
meanings.sent2: The preppiest girls in school carried designer handbags and wore loafers.
meanings.sent3: The preppiest lunchbox in the cafeteria was monogrammed with initials.
meanings.sent4: The preppiest car in the parking lot was a vintage convertible with leather seats.
meanings.sent5: She felt preppiest when wearing a blazer and a pleated skirt to class.

meanings.definition: exhibiting a preppy or preppie style or attitude
meanings.sent1: The preppiest party had a nautical theme with striped decorations.
meanings.sent2: He acted preppiest when discussing sailing and polo matches.
meanings.sent3: The preppiest cat in the neighborhood wore a tiny bowtie collar.
meanings.sent4: Her preppiest accessory was a pair of tortoiseshell sunglasses.
meanings.sent5: The preppiest playlist at the gathering featured classical music and jazz tunes.
